name: Danny DeVito
description: A renowned American actor, comedian, director, and producer known for his distinctive stature and comedic roles.

content.title: Biography
content.body: **Danny DeVito** was born on November 17, 1944, in Neptune Township, New Jersey, USA. He studied at the American Academy of Dramatic Arts, beginning his career on stage before moving onto television and film.

content.title: Career
content.body: DeVito gained widespread recognition for his role as taxi dispatcher Louie De Palma on the television show *Taxi*, which earned him a Golden Globe and an Emmy. Transitioning to film, he starred in movies such as *One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest*, *Twins*, *Batman Returns* (played The Penguin), *Matilda*, and *L.A. Confidential*. As a director, he is noted for *Throw Momma from the Train* and *The War of the Roses*.

content.title: Notable Collaborations
content.body:
- **Michael Keaton** and **Michelle Pfeiffer** in *Batman Returns*.
- **Tim Burton** on *Batman Returns*.
- **Arnold Schwarzenegger** in *Twins* and *Junior*.

content.title: Legacy
content.body: DeVito's unique blend of humor and charisma has made him an enduring presence in the entertainment industry. He has also been acknowledged for his philanthropic efforts and production work through his company Jersey Films.
